thread.section_title: Current Analysis Reports - Data Center Technology
thread.title: Fortinet Embarks On Vendor-Agnostic SDN Security Strategy, but Does Anyone Need It?
thread.title_full: Fortinet Embarks On Vendor-Agnostic SDN Security Strategy, but Does Anyone Need It?

author: Parizo, Eric
title: Fortinet Embarks On Vendor-Agnostic SDN Security Strategy, but Does Anyone Need It?
text: September 09,   Intelligence Alert As rivals battle for VMware’s good graces, Fortinet’s SDN security strategy offers a contrasting vendor-agnostic vision. However, with few companies adopting even a single SDN, heterogeneous SDN security may be too far ahead of its time.
